title: ZYFZCYBL Sherpa Fleece Throw Blanket for Couch, Pink Soft Warm Thick Blanket Twin Size for All Season Cozy Fluffy Microfiber Throw Flannel Double Reversible Luxurious Blankets for Bed Sofa, 60"x80"
description: LUXURIOUS UNIQUE DESIGN：ZYFZCYBL Sherpa Blanket is designed for luxurious feel and elegance, its made of high grade Sherpa with a classy design and feel.This cozy blanket offers the utmost comfort all year round.MULTI FUNCTIONS: ZYFZCYBL sherpa throw blanket (60" x 80") is the perfect accessory for your home and pets to get cozy—whether used as an addition to your kid's room, as a home decor element that coordinates with your couch, or as the designated cozy blanket bed for your pet.IDEAL FOR GIFTS: Luxury warm Sherpa Fleece Blanket are ideal for indoor and outdoor. Available in a variety of sizes and colours, it is a perfect gift for your friends and family at Christmas, Thanksgiving or birthdays, and can add warmth to them in the cold winter.WASHING INSTRUCTION: Machine washable in cold water with similar colors. Dries quickly on tumble dry low. No ironing or expensive cleaning required.ZYFZCYBL Sherpa Fleece Throw Blanket for Couch, Pink Soft Warm Thick Blanket for Winter Cozy Fluffy Microfiber Throw Flannel Double Reversible Luxurious Blankets for Bed Sofa, Twin Size 60"x80"
